title: Diamond no Ace (Ace of Diamond)
synopsis: With a stray pitch that completely missed the batter, Eijun Sawamura loses his final middle school baseball game. Frustrated by this defeat, Eijun and his teammates vow to reach the national tournament once they are in high school. But everything changes when a scout unexpectedly invites him to Tokyo's prestigious Seidou High School after seeing the potential in his unusual pitching style. Encouraged by his teammates, Eijun accepts the offer, ready to improve his skills and play at a much more competitive level of baseball.
related_anime: ['Diamond no Ace', 'Diamond no Ace: Second Season', 'Diamond no Ace OVA']
